title: STAT+: Biotech startup raises $175 million to advance Alzheimer’s antibody therapy
description: Is there room for more Alzheimer’s antibody therapies on the market? Korsana Biosciences' investors think so.
content: Is there room for more Alzheimer’s antibody therapies on the market? Korsana Biosciences' investors think so.
